modName: Ranger Treehouse in Ivarstead with a special secret
summary: A work-in-progress of a Treehouse in Ivarstead with unique vanilla armor and arrows for a Ranger and an amazing view with teleportation to other Treehouses around Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Work-In-Progress

Note! Now has an optional file for those who want a roof


A small-medium sized tree-house (I may make alternate versions with a basic small shack or an estate it depends what you suggest) with a chest, some vanilla Ranger Armor, a portal to a room with Aedric and Daedric Shrines, a bed, a bookshelf or two and more furniture/items.

It will have a backroom with portals to all the other treehouses that will be set in major Skyrim locations which could be a lore friendly way of fast traveling.
I want to add an underground shooting range but I currently don't have the modding skills to do that but it will probably be in the final V 1.0 ( this is my first attempt at a mod).

Currently its a smallish treehouse with a bedroll, alchemy post, some barrels and 2 chests with a shrine of Talos on the roof and some unique Ranger armor (the roof in the initial stages but ITS NOT HALF DONE its to keep out the sun from the North-East)

I plan to make it a Nord/Wood Elf Ranger Hideout/House with a side quest to go with it with links to some lore or Sovngarde or something (big plans but i have to start small :P)

If you can give me any suggestions ill be more than happy to add it into the mod.

Ill be donating 80% of my time to this so if you're reading this theres a good chance im working on it.






The Base layout of the house I got from Mr Mojo Risin' on Steam (Kieran)
author: Mikhail Wolf and Mr Mojo Risin
